definition[0]: someone whose job is to receive or pay out money in a shop
definition[1]: to force an officer to leave the army, navy etc because they have done something wrong
definition[2]: someone whose job is to take and pay out money in a shop, bank, hotel etc
definition[3]: someone who is responsible for keeping an account of the money received by and paid out by a bank or company
example[1]: The petty cash book, receipts and vouchers are presented to the head cashier, who audits them.
